titleStmt.title: A perticuler and true narration of that great and gratious deliuerance, that it pleased God of late to vouchsafe vnto the cittie of Geneua namely vpon the. xij. of December last in the yeere 1602.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by W. White] for George Potter and Richard Canter, dwelling in the Popes-head Alley neare the Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Concerns the Savoyard attack on Geneva.
A translation of an untraced original.
Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: A-B⁴.
Running title reads: The gratious deliuerance of the citie of Geneua.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: the Popes-head Alley neare the Exchange
